title: Man in Lotus Position
description:
A sitting man with their eyes closed and their legs crossed in the lotus position. 

Can be used to broadly represent yoga, meditation, relaxation, or calmness.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man in the lotus position emoji embodies serenity and mindfulness with a gentle posture and a calm, focused expression. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft, rounded forms contribute to a feeling of peace and spiritual balance. This emoji on Apple devices is frequently used to signify meditation, yoga, relaxation, or a state of inner calm.
